button.name: action_create_extra_service_charge_invoice
button.invisible: not extra_service_ids or extra_service_invoice_id != False or status in ['c_return', 'd_cancel']

button.name: action_create_vehicle_payment
button.invisible: status == 'a_draft' or installment_created != False or status == 'd_cancel'

button.name: b_in_progress_to_c_return
button.invisible: status not in ['b_in_progress'] or not vehicle_payment_option_ids

button.name: cancellation_charge_invoice
button.invisible: status not in ['d_cancel'] or cancellation_invoice_id != False

field.name: vehicle_id
field.readonly: start_date == False or end_date == False or status != 'a_draft'
